Uses of Interface
net.uniform.api.Decorator

  • Packages that use Decorator 
    Package Description
    net.uniform.api  
    net.uniform.html.decorators  
    net.uniform.impl  

    • Uses of Decorator in net.uniform.api

      Methods in net.uniform.api that return Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decorator Decorator.clearProperties()
      Removes all the properties of the decorator.
      Decorator Element.getDecorator(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns the first decorator in this element with the given class, or null if not found.
      Decorator Form.getDecorator(String id)
      Returns a decorator from the form by id, if existing.
      Decorator Element.getLastDecorator(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns the last decorator in this element with the given class, or null if not found.
      Decorator Decorator.removeProperty(String key)
      Removes a property of the decorator by key.
      Decorator Decorator.setProperties(Map<String,Object> properties)
      Sets the values of all properties of the decorator.
      Decorator Decorator.setProperty(String key, Object value)
      Sets the value of a property of the decorator by key.
      Methods in net.uniform.api that return types with arguments of type Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Decorator> Form.getDecorators()
      Returns an index of all form decorators by id.
      List<Decorator> Element.getDecorators()
      Returns the list of decorators to be used in the rendering of this element.
      List<Decorator> Form.getDefaultDecoratorsAppliedToElementClass(Class<? extends Element> clazz)
      If the element class or superclasses decorators has been explicitely set with Form.addDefaultDecoratorForElementClass(java.lang.Class, net.uniform.api.Decorator), this returns a list of decorators, otherwise returns null.
      List<Decorator> Form.getDefaultDecoratorsForElementClass(Class<? extends Element> clazz)
      Returns the default decorators set for the given element class.
      Methods in net.uniform.api with parameters of type Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element Element.addDecorator(Decorator decorator)
      Adds a decorator to the element, to be used in the Element.render() method.
      Form Form.addDefaultDecoratorForElementClass(Class<? extends Element> clazz, Decorator decorator)
      Adds a default decorator for the given element class, to be used when adding elements to the form without any decorators.
      Element Element.removeDecorator(Decorator decorator)
      Removes a decorator of this element, if present.
      Form Form.startDecorator(String id, Decorator decorator)
      Starts a form decorator that will be applied to any HTML tags produced between this and the corresponding call to Form.endDecorator() method.
      Method parameters in net.uniform.api with type arguments of type Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element Element.setDecorators(List<Decorator> decorators)
      Replaces the list of decorators of this element.
      Form Form.setDefaultDecoratorsForElementClass(Class<? extends Element> clazz, List<Decorator> decorators)
      Replaces the default decorators list for the given element class, to be used when adding elements to the form without any decorators.

    • Uses of Decorator in net.uniform.html.decorators

      Classes in net.uniform.html.decorators that implement Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ElementErrorsDecorator
      Decorator for appending or prepending a list of validation errors to any element.
      class  FormErrorsDecorator
      Decorator for appending or prepending a list of form validation errors to the form content.
      class  HTMLTagDecorator
      Decorator for enclosing any form content into an HTML tag with custom properties as attributes.
      class  LabelDecorator
      Decorator for appending or prepending an HTML label for any element.

    • Uses of Decorator in net.uniform.impl

      Classes in net.uniform.impl that implement Decorator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDecorator
      Abstract decorator implementation that contains all generic logic that any decorator should have.
      class  AbstractSingleElementDecorator
      Abstract decorator implementation that contains all generic logic that any decorator only appliable to a single element should have.
